title: Best of The Program | Guests: Madison Cawthorn, Jarrett Stepman, & Michael Shellenberger | 7/1/20
description:
24-year-old GOP congressional candidate Madison Cawthorn joins after beating a Trump-backed candidate to set the record straight about why he’s running. Jarrett Stepman, author of “The War on History,” discusses the 1619 Project and attempts to rewrite history, along with how today’s revolution is more French than American. Environmentalist Michael Shellenberger, author of “Apocalypse Never,” argues that climate change is NOT the end of the world, but that climate alarmism is a real danger to humanity.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
